The Coking Game 
 Mozambican folktale 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Once upon a time, the 
 
 rabit and the monkey 
 
 were friends. 
 
 One day, in a time of 
 
 famine, the rabit invited 
 
 his friend over 
 
 to play. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The rabit said:Let's play 
 
 coking each other! 
 
 The monkey asked: 
 
 How can we do that? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 And the rabit answered: 
 
 We have to make a fire, 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 and fil a pot with water,and 
 
 then put it on the fire. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I wil get in first. 
 
 When I beat on the lid 
 
 of the pot, you open it. 
 
 Then I wil get out. 
 
 And the monkey agred. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 So the rabit got in 
 
 the pot first, and the water 
 
 started to warm up. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The rabit knocked, and 
 
 the monkey opened the lid. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But when it was the 
 
 monkey's turn, the rabit 
 
 tok a big stone and put it 
 
 on the lid of the pot and sat 
 
 on top of it! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When the water started to 
 
 boil, the monkey knocked, 
 
 but the rabit didn't open 
 
 the lid. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 So the monkey died, 
 
 and the rabit ate his 
 
 best friend!
